WRITING.TEXT: One of the reasons I love them. Pretty sure they give away a guitar at every show. I know they did when I saw them and I've seen multiple videos when they do it. This one stood out for me though :)

WRITING.TITLE: Green Day's Billie Joe invites a disabled fan on stage and helps them play guitar. (He also let's them keep the guitar)
Green Day's Billie Joe invites a disabled fan on stage and helps them play guitar.

WRITING.TEXT: 22nd May I believe.
Toy Soldiers: Cold War is also on sale for 2.49! :)
Thanks for this! Just popped down to buy it as soon as I saw this!
If you check ebay a couple days after I'm sure you'll be able to find the item if it's one you want :)

Thank you! :) hopefully over the summer I'll be able to get more work done on it. Possibly rework some of the levels in an updated version. I've got 3 months off from Uni after next week.
I'm glad you enjoyed it! :)

I created all the assets apart from the sound effects :) Everything else was created by myself. Admittedly given the 12 week time scale I could have done a lot more. I found myself struggling to stay on track. I could have easily doubled the content. However I felt the levels were becoming bland and I was struggling to make them feel interesting.
Thanks for your review! I'll definitely work on the audio. I'm glad you enjoyed it! :)

Thanks for the detailed review!! I'll definitely look into the points you have made. I did struggle with making the levels seem interesting. I felt at point the gameplay was getting bland so I decided to mix it up a little with the rocket and sub. I feel like I'd hindered myself from the start with the movement mechanics. If I was to make this game again I'd definitely add some variety in the jump, for example, the longer you hold the higher/further you can jump.
Thanks again for your review! I'm very glad you enjoyed it!! :)

WRITING.TITLE: Pink N' Blue [My First Game]
WRITING.TEXT:
I have made a few small prototypes in the past but this is my first full game. I have been working on it for the past 12 weeks as part of a University submission. The unit was to develop my portfolio so this is my game. Here are some details about it:
2D Platformer
Depleting Health while moving
Traditional Storyline
I hope you like it! I'd love some feedback!
https://subject6214.itch.io/pnb
Happened to me many times on infantry. It sucks

WRITING.TEXT: What did they say?

What I'm hoping for...is for DICE (or for EA to allow DICE) to add ALL battlefront maps to Battlefront II. Then each iteration of the game would simply add a new era while still allowing all previous eras to be playable. This would also reduce the decrease in player Base that BF1 will see upon release of BFII.

More because...THE MOVIE WAS FREAKING AMAZING
